purple.description: Purple brand color (50% lightness). Adjusted to maintain consistent ramp progression.

dark-blue.description: Dark blue brand color (45% lightness). Adjusted to maintain consistent ramp progression.

base.description: Base spacing unit (2px). All spacing scales are multiples of this value. Figma variable type: SPACING.

100.description: 100 spacing (80px). Use for large hero spacing.

110.description: 110 spacing (96px). Use for extra large spacing.

010.description: 010 spacing (2px). Use for micro spacing needs.

020.description: 020 spacing (4px). Use for tight spacing between small elements.

030.description: 030 spacing (8px). Use for padding inside compact components.

040.description: 040 spacing (16px). Use for default padding and margins.

050.description: 050 spacing (24px). Use for section padding and larger margins.

060.description: 060 spacing (32px). Use for major section spacing.

070.description: 070 spacing (40px). Use for large vertical rhythm.

080.description: 080 spacing (48px). Use for major vertical spacing.

090.description: 090 spacing (64px). Use for hero section spacing.

undercanvas.description: Undercanvas background fill (elevation level -1). Use for elements below the main canvas. Provides subtle depth perception.

canvas.description: Canvas background fill (elevation level 0). Use as primary page/screen background. Base surface for all UI elements.

level-1.description: Level 1 surface fill (elevation level 1). Use for cards and contained components. Creates first tier of elevation.

level-2.description: Level 2 surface fill (elevation level 2). Use for overlays, popovers, tooltips. Creates second tier of elevation.

level-3.description: Level 3 surface fill (elevation level 3). Use for modals and prominent overlays. Creates third tier of elevation.

level-4.description: Level 4 surface fill (elevation level 4). Use for top-level modals and dropdowns. Creates fourth tier of elevation.

inverse.description: Inverse surface fill (dark background). Use for dark mode or high-contrast sections. Provides visual separation.

strong.description: Strong accent color for surface. Use for prominent UI elements like badges or highlights on surfaces. High contrast primary accent.

subtle.description: Subtle accent color for surface. Use for secondary UI elements or backgrounds needing accent treatment. Low contrast light accent.

default.description: Primary button background - default state. References brand pink (#da095e).

hover.description: Primary button background - hover state. 41% lightness, WCAG White AA Normal.

pressed.description: Primary button background - pressed state. 32% lightness, WCAG White AAA Normal.

fill.description: Primary button fill/background. Use for main call-to-action buttons. References brand pink.

default.description: Primary button text - default state. White text on pink background.

hover.description: Primary button text - hover state. 89% lightness for subtle contrast reduction.

pressed.description: Primary button text - pressed state. 84% lightness for visual feedback.

text.description: Primary button text color. Use for text in primary buttons. Ensures high contrast.

default.description: Primary button icon - default state. References primary text color.

hover.description: Primary button icon - hover state. References primary text hover color.

pressed.description: Primary button icon - pressed state. References primary text pressed color.

icon.description: Primary button icon color. Use for icons in primary buttons. Matches text color for consistency.

default.description: Secondary button background - default state. White background.

hover.description: Secondary button background - hover state. 95% lightness for subtle hover effect.

pressed.description: Secondary button background - pressed state. 89% lightness for pressed feedback.

fill.description: Secondary button fill/background. Use for secondary actions. Light background with border.

default.description: Secondary button border - default state. References brand purple (#8b006e).

hover.description: Secondary button border - hover state. 41% lightness, darker purple for emphasis.

pressed.description: Secondary button border - pressed state. 32% lightness, darkest purple for pressed state.

border.description: Secondary button border color. Use for border of secondary buttons. References brand purple.

default.description: Secondary button text - all states. Black text on white/light backgrounds.

hover.description: Secondary button text - hover state. Consistent black text.

pressed.description: Secondary button text - pressed state. Consistent black text.

text.description: Secondary button text color. Use for text in secondary buttons. High contrast dark color.

default.description: Secondary button icon - default state. References secondary text color.

hover.description: Secondary button icon - hover state. References secondary text hover color.

pressed.description: Secondary button icon - pressed state. References secondary text pressed color.

icon.description: Secondary button icon color. Use for icons in secondary buttons. Matches text color for consistency.

link.description: Link color. Use for hyperlinks and text links. Purple for recognizable link appearance.

fill.description: Error banner/alert background. Use for error state containers. Light red tint for visibility.

text.description: Error banner/alert text and headings. High contrast dark red for readability on light backgrounds.

border.description: Error banner/alert border. Emphasizes error state visually. Same as text color for cohesion.

icon.description: Error banner/alert icon color. Matches text and border for visual consistency.

fill.description: Success banner/alert background. Use for success/confirmation containers. Light green tint for visibility.

text.description: Success banner/alert text and headings. High contrast dark green for readability on light backgrounds.

border.description: Success banner/alert border. Emphasizes success state visually. Same as text color for cohesion.

icon.description: Success banner/alert icon color. Matches text and border for visual consistency.

fill.description: Warning banner/alert background. Use for warning/caution containers. Light yellow tint for visibility.

text.description: Warning banner/alert text and headings. High contrast dark orange for readability on light backgrounds.

border.description: Warning banner/alert border. Emphasizes warning state visually. Uses darker orange for strong emphasis.

icon.description: Warning banner/alert icon color. Matches text and border for visual consistency.

fill.description: Info banner/alert background. Use for informational containers. Light blue tint for visibility.

text.description: Info banner/alert text and headings. High contrast dark blue for readability on light backgrounds.

border.description: Info banner/alert border. Emphasizes info state visually. Same as text color for cohesion.

icon.description: Info banner/alert icon color. Matches text and border for visual consistency.

a.description: Disabled state palette option A. Light grey (84% lightness) for flexible component combinations. Use with disabled.b and/or disabled.c based on component aesthetics.

b.description: Disabled state palette option B. Light-mid grey (74% lightness) for contrast and emphasis. Use with disabled.a and/or disabled.c based on component aesthetics.

c.description: Disabled state palette option C. Mid grey (63% lightness) for critical text/borders. Use with disabled.a and/or disabled.b based on component aesthetics.

level-negative-1.description: Elevation level -1 (undercanvas). Lightest surface fill. Used for below-canvas elements.

level-0.description: Elevation level 0 (canvas). Base page background. Primary working surface.

level-1.description: Elevation level 1. Cards and contained components. First elevation tier.

level-2.description: Elevation level 2. Overlays, popovers, tooltips. Second elevation tier.

level-3.description: Elevation level 3. Modals and prominent overlays. Third elevation tier.

level-4.description: Elevation level 4. Top-level modals and dropdowns. Fourth elevation tier.

level-inverse.description: Elevation level inverse. Dark background surface. For high-contrast needs.

primary.description: Border color for elevated surfaces. Provides subtle visual separation for any elevation level. Use with corresponding elevation fill tokens for visual cohesion.

a.description: Primary font family for the design system. Use for UI copy and headings. Figma variable type: FONT_FAMILY.

regular.description: Regular font weight (400). Use for default body text. Figma variable type: FONT_WEIGHT.

bold.description: Bold font weight (700). Use for emphasis and headings. Figma variable type: FONT_WEIGHT.

base.description: Base multiplier for typography scale. Change this value to scale all typography proportionally (e.g., 1.5 for 150%). Figma variable type: NUMBER. Purpose: multiply with font sizes to generate final size values.

ratio.description: Major Second scale ratio (1.125). Other common ratios: Minor Second (1.067), Minor Third (1.2), Major Third (1.25), Perfect Fourth (1.333), Golden Ratio (1.618). Figma variable type: NUMBER.

xxs.description: Extra-extra-small (8px). Purpose: micro UI labels / captions. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xxs

xs.description: Extra-small (12px). Purpose: small UI text, helper text. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xs

sm.description: Small (14px). Purpose: secondary body text, small labels. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-sm

md.description: Medium (16px). Purpose: primary body copy. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-md

lg.description: Large (18px). Purpose: lead paragraphs and subheadings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-lg

xl.description: Extra-large (20px). Purpose: prominent headings and larger headings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xl

xxl.description: 2x Extra-large (22px). Purpose: section headings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-xxl

3xl.description: 3x Extra-large (24px). Purpose: display headings and hero text on small devices. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-3xl

4xl.description: 4x Extra-large (28px). Purpose: large display headings on wide breakpoints. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-4xl

5xl.description: 5x Extra-large (32px). Purpose: large hero headings; use sparingly. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-5xl

6xl.description: 6x Extra-large (34px). Purpose: Display/marketing hero text or large headings. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-6xl

7xl.description: 7x Extra-large (36px). Purpose: Large marketing display text; use sparingly. Figma variable type: FONT_SIZE. Recommended CSS var: --font-size-7xl

tight.description: Tight (16px) - Use for compact UI text and labels. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-tight.

snug.description: Snug (18px) - Slightly tighter than normal, use for small paragraph text. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-snug.

normal.description: Normal (20px) - Default comfortable reading line height for body text. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-normal.

comfortable.description: Comfortable (22px) - Slightly more breathing room, good for subheadings and mid-weight headlines. Figma variable type: NUMBER. CSS var: --line-height-comfortable.

large.description: Link Large: 18px, Regular weight, underline. Aligns with body large text.

medium.description: Link Medium: 16px, Regular weight, underline. Aligns with body medium text.

small.description: Link Small: 14px, Regular weight, underline. Aligns with body small text.

large.description: Body Large: 18px, Regular weight. For lead paragraphs and prominent body text.

medium.description: Body Medium: 16px, Regular weight. Standard body text.

small.description: Body Small: 14px, Regular weight. Secondary body text.

large.description: Label Large: 18px, Bold weight. For prominent form labels and UI labels.

medium.description: Label Medium: 16px, Bold weight. Standard form labels and UI labels.

small.description: Label Small: 14px, Bold weight. Compact form labels and UI labels.

elevation-negative-1.description: Undercanvas shadow. No visible shadow (elevation below canvas).

elevation-0.description: Canvas shadow. Minimal shadow for subtle definition on canvas level.

elevation-1.description: Level 1 shadow. Noticeable elevation for cards and floating elements.

elevation-2.description: Level 2 shadow. Stronger elevation for dropdowns and popovers.

elevation-3.description: Level 3 shadow. Pronounced elevation for sticky headers and persistent UI.

elevation-4.description: Level 4 shadow. Maximum elevation for modals and top-level overlays.

elevation-inverse.description: Inverse shadow. Light shadow on dark backgrounds for high contrast.
